00020 
00021 using System;
00022 using System.Collections;
00023 
00024 using Niry;
00025 using Niry.Utils;
00026 using Niry.Network;
00027 
00028 using NyFolder;
00029 using NyFolder.Utils;
00030 using NyFolder.Protocol;
00031 
00032 namespace NyFolder.Protocol {
00034     public static class DownloadManager {
00035         // ============================================
00036         // PUBLIC Events
00037         // ============================================
00039         public static event BlankEventHandler ReceivedPart = null;
00041         public static event BlankEventHandler Finished = null;
00043         public static event BlankEventHandler Aborted = null;
00045         public static event BlankEventHandler Added = null;
00046 
00047         // ============================================
00048         // PRIVATE Members
00049         // ============================================
00050         private static FileList acceptList = null;
00051         private static FileList recvList = null;
00052         private static int numDownloads = 0;
00053 
00054         // ============================================
00055         // PUBLIC (Init/Clear) Methods
00056         // ============================================
00058         public static void Initialize() {
00059             // Initialize Events (None)
00060             ReceivedPart = null;
00061             Finished = null;
00062             Aborted = null;
00063             Added = null;
00064 
00065             // Create Thread-Safe File Lists Instances
00066             acceptList = new FileList();
00067             recvList = new FileList();
00068             numDownloads = 0;
00069         }
00070 
00072         public static void Clear() {
00073             acceptList.RemoveAll();
00074             recvList.RemoveAll();
00075             numDownloads = 0;
00076         }
00077 
00078         // ============================================
00079         // PUBLIC Methods
00080         // ============================================
00082         public static void Accept  (PeerSocket peer, ulong id, 
00083                                     string path, string saveAs) 
00084         {
00085             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id, peer, path, saveAs);
00086             fileRecv.EndAbort += new BlankEventHandler(OnEndAbort);
00087 
00088             acceptList.Add(peer, fileRecv);
00089 
00090             // Update Num Downloads
00091             numDownloads++;
00092 
00093             // Raise Added Event
00094             if (Added != null) Added(fileRecv);
00095         }
00096 
00098         public static void InitDownload (PeerSocket peer, ulong id, XmlRequest xml) {
00099             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id);
00100             if ((fileRecv = (FileReceiver) acceptList.Search(peer, fileRecv)) == null) {
00101                 ArrayList files = acceptList.GetFiles(peer);
00102 
00103                 string name = (string) xml.Attributes["name"];
00104                 foreach (FileReceiver fRecv in files) {
00105                     if (fRecv.Name == name) {
00106                         fileRecv = fRecv;
00107                         break;
00108                     }
00109                 }
00110             }
00111             acceptList.Remove(peer, fileRecv);
00112             fileRecv.Id = id;
00113             recvList.Add(peer, fileRecv);
00114             fileRecv.Init(xml);
00115         }
00116 
00118         public static void GetFilePart (PeerSocket peer, ulong id, XmlRequest xml) {
00119             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id);
00120             fileRecv = (FileReceiver) recvList.Search(peer, fileRecv);
00121             if (fileRecv == null) return;
00122 
00123             // Add Part
00124             fileRecv.AddPart(xml);
00125 
00126             // Raise Received Event
00127             if (ReceivedPart != null) ReceivedPart(fileRecv);
00128         }
00129 
00131         public static void AbortDownload (PeerSocket peer, ulong id) {
00132             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id);
00133             if ((fileRecv = (FileReceiver) acceptList.Search(peer, fileRecv)) != null) {
00134                 acceptList.Remove(peer, fileRecv);
00135             } else {
00136                 fileRecv = (FileReceiver) recvList.Search(peer, new FileReceiver(id));
00137                 if (fileRecv == null) return;
00138                 recvList.Remove(peer, fileRecv);
00139             }
00140 
00141             AbortDownload(fileRecv);
00142         }
00143 
00145         public static void AbortDownload (string fileName) {
00146             FileReceiver fileRecv = null;
00147 
00148             if ((fileRecv = (FileReceiver) acceptList.Search(fileName)) != null) {
00149                 acceptList.Remove(fileRecv.Peer, fileRecv);
00150             } else {
00151                 fileRecv = (FileReceiver) recvList.Search(fileName);
00152                 if (fileRecv == null) return;
00153                 recvList.Remove(fileRecv.Peer, fileRecv);
00154             }
00155 
00156             AbortDownload(fileRecv);
00157         }
00158 
00160         public static void FinishedDownload (PeerSocket peer, ulong id) {
00161             FileReceiver fileRecv = new FileReceiver(id);
00162             fileRecv = (FileReceiver) recvList.Search(peer, fileRecv);
00163             fileRecv.Save();
00164             fileRecv.EndAbort -= new BlankEventHandler(OnEndAbort);
00165             recvList.Remove(peer, fileRecv);
00166 
00167             // Update Num Downloads
00168             numDownloads--;
00169 
00170             // Raise Finished Event
00171             if (Finished != null) Finished(fileRecv);
00172         }
00173 
00176         public static bool IsInList (string filePath) {
00177             if (acceptList.HasFile(filePath) == true)
00178                 return(true);
00179             if (recvList.HasFile(filePath) == true)
00180                 return(true);
00181             return(false);
00182         }
00183 
00184         // ============================================
00185         // PRIVATE (Methods) Event Handlers
00186         // ============================================
00187         private static void OnEndAbort (object sender) {
00188             FileReceiver fileRecv = sender as FileReceiver;
00189             AbortDownload(fileRecv);
00190         }
00191 
00192         // ============================================
00193         // PRIVATE Methods
00194         // ============================================
00195         private static void AbortDownload (FileReceiver fileRecv) {
00196             // Abort Download
00197             fileRecv.EndAbort -= new BlankEventHandler(OnEndAbort);
00198             fileRecv.Abort();
00199 
00200             // Update Num Downloads
00201             numDownloads--;
00202 
00203             // Raise Aborted Event
00204             if (Aborted != null) Aborted(fileRecv);
00205         }
00206 
00207         // ============================================
00208         // PUBLIC Properties
00209         // ============================================
00211         public static int NDownloads {
00212             get { return(numDownloads); }
00213         }
00214 
00216         public static FileList AcceptList {
00217             get { return(acceptList); }
00218         }
00219         
00221         public static FileList ReceivingList {
00222             get { return(recvList); }
00223         }
00224     }
00225 }
